text: Oni sprashivayut tebya o tom, chto razreshayetsya im v pishchu. Skazhi: "Vam razreshayutsya dobryye snedi. To, chto izlovyat dlya vas khishchnyye ptitsy, kakikh priuchayete k lovu, psy, kotorykh priuchayete k okhote za tem, chto ukazal vam Bog, yesh'te, i prizyvayte imya Bozhiye nad onym: boytes' Boga, potomu chto Bog skor v vostrebovanii otchota
